doc.title: Editie laat: Van kapitaal belang
doc.plot: One of the background- magazines on different days of the week, all aired by the Flemish public broadcast VRT at a late hour (hence the common first part of the title, Dutch for 'Late Edition'), in this case devoted to the socio-economical life in Belgium and internationally, trying to look beyond the day-to-day news on markets etc. to business - and policy trends, market players, institutions, rules and mechanisms etc. as such.
